title: Symphonic Brass
short_description: We play a mixture of film scores, traditional brass music and more. We are a small ensemble of high level players who sound amazing when we perform.

schedule_organisation.name: BrassSoc
schedule_organisation.description: The University of Warwick Brass Society or BrassSoc for short is a fun, friendly and lively group to get involved with. The society welcomes all brass players, percussionists and even those who have never picked up a brass instrument before! Our award winning ensembles (which include a brass band, a symphonic brass ensemble and a beginners brass group) welcome all standards of musicians, and (apart from symphonic brass) are all non-auditioned. With over 50 members, we provide opportunities for all brass players to rehearse, perform and socialise regularly.

schedule_venue.name: Piazza Stage
schedule_venue.description: Our big stage on Benefactors place next to the Piazza.
